about_the_game:
Immerses yourself in Paris at the dawn of the 20th century. The once-grand city is crumbling under the influence of a mysterious force that devours its buildings and inhabitants: The Entropy.

Despite the research of a consortium of scientists and engineers, the mystery deepens when metallic gardens begin to crystallize around strange trees with colorful reflections, emerging within the city’s ancient monuments.

This vegetation seems to be linked to Entropy, representing the last hope for the healing of both living beings and the planet. Léon’s journey becomes a quest to uncover the secrets of Entropy and, perhaps, save what remains of the world.

In this adventure game, exploration is at the heart of the gameplay. Traverse deserted streets and crumbling buildings, as Entropy gradually transforms your environment. Solve puzzles as you move through a city where each step could bring you closer to the truth… or to destruction.

Léon’s special abilities allow you to manipulate sand, interacting with the world and confronting danger. Use these skills to uncover secrets hidden within the ruins and face relentless entities.

- Explore a dystopian Paris: Wander through stylized city, transformed by the sand caused by erosion. A legendary city haunted by history, where Entropy gradually consumes everything in its path.

- A story of redemption: Follow Léon and Ernest’s journey as they seek answers, caught between a tumultuous past and an uncertain future.

- Contemplative and narrative-driven atmosphere: Experience a heartbreaking adventure in a world where the fragility of time and humanity is at the heart of every challenge.

- Exploration and Puzzle Gameplay: Dive into an immersive adventure where the discovery of fascinating places blends with thoughtful challenges to deliver a rich experience.

- Manipulate sand: Use unique powers to control and interact with the black sand, solve puzzles, and outsmart enemies.

Entropia is developed by Attaboy Interactive, an independent video game studio based in France. Founded in 2022, Attaboy Interactive specializes in creating captivating gaming experiences through immersive worlds, thrilling adventures, and engaging gameplay. With a passionate team, Attaboy Interactive explores new narrative and interactive frontiers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3100 / Intel Core i3-8100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 1700X / Intel Core i5-8600K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 3050 / Radeon RX 5600XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A third-person adventure game in a dystopian 1920s Paris consumed by Entropy. As buildings crumble into sand, Léon, a young orphan with the ability to manipulate this sand embark on a quest for truth and confront the remains of a city collapsing beneath his feet.
